section_title:
16a09 - Garnishment of employees of
states or their political subdivisions.
text:
Applicable state or local
laws regulate whether the earnings of a city, county or state employee are
subject to garnishment. To the extent that state or local law permits such garnishment,
the limitations imposed by the CCPA apply. WH has no authority to enforce provisions
of state or local garnishment laws. (See FOH 16a01, 52a11 and 52v02.)
html: Applicable state or local laws regulate whether the earnings of a city, county or state employee are subject to garnishment. To the extent that state or local law permits such garnishment, the limitations imposed by the CCPA apply. WH has no authority to enforce provisions of state or local garnishment laws. (See FOH 16a01, 52a11 and 52v02.)
